ygData.subject: Re: Cleric Behaviour
ygData.msgSnippet: Interesting... It was SoW I couldn t remove. I had gone into Treeform and a kindly druid came around, cast SoW on me. SoW overwrites Treeform and keeps you
ygData.messageBody:
Interesting... It was SoW I couldn't remove.

I had gone into Treeform and a kindly druid came around, cast SoW on me.
SoW overwrites Treeform and keeps you from turning Treeform off.
and I couldn't get rid of SoW either :(

On Mon, 23 Aug 1999, Allsar wrote:

> From: "Allsar" <bogey@...>
>
> i've been able to accidentaly remove SOW or a high level symbol :(
>
> -----Original Message-----
> From: Perhaps a Princess... <sarah@...>
> To: EQ-Clerics@onelist.com <EQ-Clerics@onelist.com>
